title: Google Drive File Stream - Fix problems syncing to your computer

actions.value:
Hi {{ticket.requester.name}}‍,
Sorry to hear Google Drive File Stream isn't working as expected.

We can troubleshoot this issue over the internet for AUD$168 including up to 60 minutes of support.

Please book in a time at https://itsolver.net/cal

Alternatively, for free support, refer to this article: https://support.itsolver.net/hc/en-au/articles/115005123203-Google-Drive-File-Stream-encountered-a-problem-and-has-stopped
